name: Rise of the Tomb Raider - Lara's Nightmare
name_original: Rise of the Tomb Raider - Lara's Nightmare
description:
Rise of the Tomb Raider - Lara's Nightmare is an action game. It was originally released in 2016. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Rise of the Tomb Raider - Lara's Nightmare is available on PC and PlayStation 4.
